name: jquery-first-payment-table
description: Shows time to first payment for Blossom profit sharing based on when funds received

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/ && cp jquery.first-payment-table.js dist/ && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js dist/ && cp node_modules/moment/moment.js dist/ && cp node_modules/@blossomfinance/bootstrap-theme/styleguide/all.clean.css dist/

author: Matthew J. Martin <matthew@blossomfinance.com>
